sentences.en: Add pasta to your salads to bump up your fibre intake.
sentences.cn: 在色拉中加入意大利面条，增加你的纤维摄入量。

sentences.en: Coil the fibre into a helix.
Fats and sugar are very rich in energy but poor in vitamins, minerals and dietary fibre.
sentences.cn: 脂肪和糖类热量很高，但维生素、矿物质和膳食纤维贫乏。

sentences.en: Fibre is found in cereal foods, beans, fruit and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 谷类食品、豆类、水果和蔬菜中含有纤维素。

sentences.en: food that is high in dietary fibre
Fruit and vegetables are high in fibre content .
sentences.cn: 水果和蔬菜的纤维素含量很高。

sentences.en: High fibre diets give the feeling of fullness.
sentences.cn: 高纤维饮食让人有饱胀感。

sentences.en: I wanted to be an actress with every fibre of my being.
sentences.cn: 我一心一意想去做演员。

sentences.en: In its untreated state the carbon fibre material is rather like cloth.
sentences.cn: 原始的碳纤维材料很像布料。

sentences.en: In pregnancy a high fibre diet is doubly important.
sentences.cn: 在孕期，含高纤维素的饮食越发地重要。

sentences.en: Nearly every long-distance call made in Britain now travels on optical fibre instead of cable.
sentences.cn: 现在在英国，几乎所有长途电话都通过光纤而非电缆传输。

sentences.en: Nylon is a man - made fibre.
The ball is made of rattan — a natural fibre.
sentences.cn: 这个球是由一种天然纤维——省藤制成的。

sentences.en: The dye is adsorbed onto the fibre.
There is little doubt that a diet high in fibre is more satisfying.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，高纤维的饮食更尽人意。

sentences.en: There is more fibre in wholemeal bread than in white bread.
sentences.cn: 全麦面包纤维含量比白面包高。

words.tran_cn: [医] 纤维性颤动，[生物] 原纤维形成
[生化] 纤维蛋白原；纤朊原

phrases.tran_cn: 聚丙烯腈系纤维；丙烯酸纤维
陶瓷纤维；耐火陶瓷纤维

trans.tran_en: the parts of plants that you eat but cannot  digest  . Fibre helps to keep you healthy by moving food quickly through your body.
